title: Houmous with pine nuts
description: We show you how to make quick vegan houmous with pine nuts that’s seriously smooth and creamy. It’s the perfect dip for sharing with friends in front of the TV.
ingredients: 1 x 400g tin of chickpeas, drained (keep the water)

method.Step 1: Put the drained chickpeas in a food processor with 50ml of the reserved chickpea water. Add the tahini, lemon juice, garlic clove, and olive oil and some seasoning.

method.Step 2: Whizz until smooth, adding a little more of the chickpea water if you need to. Stir in the pine nuts and serve.
